content: The Gall Gem is likely to be the first of the Soaks you find in Black Myth: Wukong during your exploration of Black Wind Mountain. The Gall Gem is one of the most basic Soaks, giving you a slight buff, although not quite as drastic of a buff as many of the others you will find later on.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gall_Gem.md', within the main section titled 'Gall Gem'.
The content is as follows:
The Gall Gem is likely to be the first of the Soaks you find in Black Myth: Wukong during your exploration of Black Wind Mountain. The Gall Gem is one of the most basic Soaks, giving you a slight buff, although not quite as drastic of a buff as many of the others you will find later on.
